rule.name: Substitution
rule.str: substitute y for x / t at 1

rule.name: Substitution
rule.str: substitute y for x / t at 1

rule.name: ApplyEquation
rule.str: apply equation:(D t. g(t)) = -2 * (D t. INT y:[0,1]. exp((-(1 + y ^ 2) * t ^ 2) / 2) / (1 + y ^ 2)) at 0.0

rule.name: ApplyEquation
rule.str: apply equation:(D t. g(t)) = -2 * (D t. INT y:[0,1]. exp((-(1 + y ^ 2) * t ^ 2) / 2) / (1 + y ^ 2)) at 0.0

rule.name: ApplyEquation
rule.str: apply equation:(LIM {t -> oo}. g(t)) = g(oo) at 1.0

rule.name: ApplyEquation
rule.str: apply equation:(LIM {t -> oo}. g(t)) = g(oo) at 1.0
